item.title: [Exploit development] 2- Understanding Stack Memory
item.author: elsharifabdallah53@gmail.com (Abdallah Mohamed)
item.description: Intro Hello everyone, I hope you are doing well. In this article, we will discuss the stack, how it works. and the operations performed on it. Understanding the stack will pave the way for us in the exploit development field and other fields like malware development. What is Stack? The stack is a temporary memory that behaves as a first-in-last-out buffer, divided into a group of frames on top of each other.
